AECOM Salesforce Go/No Go Conversation Record CreatedGo/No Go ID:{!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Name}Opportunity Name:{!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Opportunity_Name__c}
An opportunity has been created with you assigned as the capture/bid manager.
A Go/No Go conversation is required before starting work on the proposal. A GNG Record has been created within Salesforce to guide the conversation and record the outcome.
Please note that the GNG comprises two parts, both of which must be completed and Approved prior to a bid being submitted:
Part 1 Why Go – Review of the Opportunity and Approval to prepare a bid. Part 2 Proposal Review – Review of our Proposal and Approval to submit.
To complete the Go/No Go Conversation Record Click Here. {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Link}.
This email was generated: {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.LastModifiedDate} by {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.LastModifiedBy}. Please do not reply to this email. Contact the marketing manager in your region if there are any problems or issues.
